segments.text: Are you ready for your first driving lesson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Which one is the brake again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pedal on your left is the brake and the one on your right is the gas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m glad this car is an automatic . I don't like having to change gears .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Automatics are very simple to drive . The first thing you should do is put your seat belt on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should also put yours on . you never know what will happen with me in the driver ’ s seat !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very funny . Next you should check your side mirrors and your rear view mirror . Can you see out of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t see anything out of the side mirror on your side of the car . Could you move it forward a bit , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The tank is almost empty . I guess I ’ ll drive to the petrol station to fill it up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . Put your keys in the ignition , start it up , put the car in reserve , wait for the road to be clear , and then back out of the driveway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it . Don ’ t worry . I ’ ll get you there in one piece .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember , no honking this time . The horn is only for emergencies !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why does that cop car behind me have its red lights on ?
segments.speaker: S2
